titles.title: VET CARE Act of 2017
VET CARE Act of 2017
Veterans Early Treatment for Chronic Ailment Resurgence through Examinations Act of 2017
Veterans Early Treatment for Chronic Ailment Resurgence through Examinations Act of 2017
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a pilot program for the provision of dental care to certain veterans, and for other purposes.
VET CARE Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
